!https://derpicdn.net/img/2012/10/4/113582/full.jpg![/bq]
I don't know what the relevance of Colin Mochrie next to Opalescence is, but goddamn if it didn't make me laugh anyways

"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/553f8e866368721554920800#post_553f8e866368721554920800
[bq="HJSDGCE"]!http://cdn.meme.am/instances/57400777.jpg!

So, I just thought of a funny scenario if I never will get my driver's license.

I was a political leader of the world and one day, I got late to somewhere. When they asked why, I told them I didn't have a driver's license so I had to take a cab. And then, people started to overreact like they always do, wondering if I deserve my place as a political leader since I don't have a license to drive.

I couldn't imagine what would happen next though.[/bq]
This is why I will never get anywhere in life

Well mainly because I can't drive anywhere :P

So everyone secretly wants to beat me up when I'm not here

Shows what I know about the Dragon Ball industry.
